short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly search for upgrade availability with 2LNR!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Speed up searches for flight upgrade availability on select services to get the most out of your loyalty program and tool subscriptions.

Current support:
- American Airlines upgrades shown on ExpertFlyer.com: correctly highlights upgrade availability on AA-operated flights, accounting for segment-by-segment search requirements. Customize the color you want the valid rows to be highlighted!
